name: The Beast in the Maze
description:
:
A mysterious maze can be found deep in the woods.
You have always wanted to see it.
Once you cross its gate, you can venture inside to discover its secrets and meet its inhabitant, the Beast.

- - -

How to play:
- Use the arrow keys to move (no mouse input);
- Use enter/escape to interact;
- The cursor indicates the entrance/exit you just came from, so if you get lost, just look at it;
- There are 5 pages to be found, remember to keep track of them as they influence the ending;
- There are 5 possible endings;
- You can save your progress anytime;
- ! The map does not update your current position.

- - -

Duration:
I would say the game lasts 15-20~ minutes, but it all depends on how fast you can walk through the maze, find the pages and read them.

Trigger warnings:
- Nudity (nothing too explicit);
- Description of gore.

- - -

Made by Chiropteram with RPG Maker MV for the Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams.
